sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"the-sprucebot-user"}}>{`The Sprucebot User`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A Skill cannot access a user directly. It's gotta go through a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Location`}</MDXTag>{`. So, when a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`user`}</MDXTag>{` is retrieved, it comes with more than just `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`firstName`}</MDXTag>{`. It includes the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Location`}</MDXTag>{` as well as things like `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`role`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`status`}</MDXTag>{`, and number of `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`visits`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"user-object"}}>{`User object`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`{
    id: UUID4,
    createdAt: Date, // date the user joined the location
    updatedAt: Date, // date the user changed their subscription to the location
    role: String, // owner|teammate|guest
    status: String, // offline|online
    visits: Number, // how many visits to this location
    lastRecordedVisit: Date, // when they last visited the shop
    Location: {
        id: UUID4,
        createdAt: Date,
        updatedAt: Date,
        name: String,
        addressLine1: String,
        addressLine2: String,
        addressCity: String,
        addressState: String
        addressZip: String,
        addressCountry: String,
        geo: (-105.1021021,39.9223797), // geo coded using google
        OrganizationId: UUID4
    },
    User: {
        id: UUID4,
        createdAt: Date,
        updatedAt: Date,
        firstName: String, // the users first name or NULL
        name: String, // the users first name + last name, or Friend
        casualName: String, // first name or Friend,
        profileImages: { // null if no profile image uploaded
            profile60: String,
            profile60@2x: String,
            profile150: String,
            profile150@2x: String
        },
        defaultProfileImages: { // always used as fallback
            profile60: String,
            profile60@2x: String,
            profile150: String,
            profile150@2x: String
        }

    }
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"roles"}}>{`Roles`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`There are only 3 roles in Sprucebot, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`owner`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`teammate`}</MDXTag>{`, and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`guest`}</MDXTag>{`. These roles are tied to a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Location`}</MDXTag>{`. Here is how each role functions in core.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`owner`}</MDXTag>{` - Can enable/disable skills, manage `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`teammates`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`guests`}</MDXTag>{`. All done from the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Biz Dashboard`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`teammate`}</MDXTag>{` - Can manage `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`guests`}</MDXTag>{`. Also has access to `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Biz Dashboard`}</MDXTag>{`. Tends to get a more restricted view of a skill.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`guest`}</MDXTag>{` - Can only see their `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Dashboard`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"api"}}>{`API`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`// Fetch a single user
const guest = await ctx.sb.user(locationId: UUID4, userId: UUID4)

console.log(guest) // {User} or null

// Fetch a bunch of users
const teammates = await ctx.sb.users(locationId: UUID4, {
    role: String, // optional (owner|teammate|guest|ownerteammate)
    status: String, // optional (online|offline)
    page: Number, // optional (defaults to 0)
    limit: Number, // optional (default to 10, max 200)
})

console.log(teammates) // [{User},{User},{User}] or []

// Update a user
const guest = await ctx.sb.updateUser(userId: UUID4, {
    firstName: String
})

console.log(guest) // {User}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"gotchyas"}}>{`Gotchya's`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`A `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`User`}</MDXTag>{` isn't just a user, so pay attention to what you are accessing.  `}<MDXTag name="del" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="del">{`user.casualName`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{` ->  `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`user.User.casualName`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`A `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`User`}</MDXTag>{` always comes with a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Location`}</MDXTag>{`, so access it via `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`user.User.Location`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`user.User.casualName`}</MDXTag>{` is "Friend" or firstName`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`When sending a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`message`}</MDXTag>{` to a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`user`}</MDXTag>{` about themselves (Hello Taylor!), use `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`\${user.User.casualName}`}</MDXTag>{`. You don't need the last initial and want it to fall back to "Friend".`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`When sending a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`message`}</MDXTag>{` to a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`user`}</MDXTag>{` about someone else, use `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`\${user.User.name}`}</MDXTag>{` so it includes the last name.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Use `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`user.User.name`}</MDXTag>{` when sending one person's name to another (to help identify)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`You will rarely have to call `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`ctx.sb.user()`}</MDXTag>{` since it's attached as `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`ctx.auth`}</MDXTag>{` for the currently logged in `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`User`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`A user doesn't have much besides a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`firstName`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`profilePhotos`}</MDXTag>{`, everything you need to store beyond that can be done using `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Meta`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`To search for both teammates and owners, search against `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`role=ownerteammate`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"examples"}}>{`Examples`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"sending-a-message-to-all-teammates-at-the-shop-when-a-guest-enters"}}>{`Sending a message to all teammates at the shop when a guest enters`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Difficulty level`}</MDXTag>{`: Easy`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Description`}</MDXTag>{`: You run a Vip service and want to make sure to let `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`teammates`}</MDXTag>{` know when a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`guest`}</MDXTag>{` arrives. No interface will be covered in this example.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Required Reading`}</MDXTag>{`:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"server.md"}}>{`Server`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"messaging.md"}}>{`Messaging`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"lang.md"}}>{`Lang`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"events.md"}}>{`Events`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"setup-listener"}}>{`Setup listener`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Since we want to send a message when a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`guest`}</MDXTag>{` arrives, we'll create a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`did-enter`}</MDXTag>{` listener. We'll check `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`ctx.event.User.role`}</MDXTag>{` to make sure the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`user`}</MDXTag>{` entering is a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`guest`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`// server/events/did-enter.js
module.exports = async (ctx, next) => {

    // only notify about guests arriving
    if (ctx.event.User.role === 'guest') {

        next() // Core can move on to whatever it was gonna do

        // load all teammates and owners whe are currently logged onto the wifi
        const teammates = ctx.sb.users(ctx.event.Location.id, {
            role: 'ownerteammate',
            status: 'online'
        })

        // message everyone, one at a time
        await Promise.all(teammates.map((teammate) => 
            ctx.sb.message(
                ctx.event.Location.id, 
                teammate.User.id, 
                ctx.utilities.lang.getText('didEnterMessage', { guest: event, teammate })
            )
        )
    } else {

        // pass control back to server
        await next()

    }

}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`// interface/lang/default.js
module.exports = {
    didEnterMessage: ({ guest, teammate }) => \`\${event.User.name} just showed up!\`
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"whats-next"}}>{`What's next?`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`We've had to pull in bits from all over to make these examples work, but now would be a good time to dive into the `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"meta.md"}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="a">{`meta`}</MDXTag>{` object`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
MDXContent.isMDXComponent = true
